text: 1.4: 2 Ko 7.1; Ef 4.24; 2 Pi 2.18-20; 1 Zo 3.2Ana nzan kamgiap, ana bigi vhuuiŋ guarira gum guigira bigi bakɨvira nza nɨɨŋgi. Mba bigi, ana fhum ntan nzan nɨɨn za suaŋgi. Nza kha nuianan ki gumgi gu mbigi, nza bigi garav, nta nzuav ndavi khavi tɨvi, nta nzan ndavi vherir kav, nza muuŋgim, nza guigira mbatɨgi. Ana guigira bigir vhuuiŋ guarira nza nɨɨŋgi. Ana nden kurkura zav mba tɨva muuŋgi. Ana maaŋ nden muuŋgirim, nde mba tɨvi mbatɨgi ŋkɨɨav, nde ana kɨrɨ tɨvi gum ana tɨvi ndirga.
